ds:DataSource.ds:Query: select distinct TO_CHAR(inv.create_on, 'DD.MM.YYYY', 'nls_date_language = RUSSIAN') AS created, OBD_SYS.GET_FIO_FULL(inv.mover) AS mover_full, OBD_SYS.GET_FIO_FULL(inv.accepts) AS acceptor_full, OBD_SYS.GET_DEPARTMENT_NAME(inv.accepts) AS department, OBD_SYS.GET_USER_POSITION(inv.mover) AS mover_position, OBD_SYS.GET_USER_POSITION(inv.accepts) AS acceptor_position, case addr.building_id when 3115 then 'удаленно' else 'по адресу – ' || addr.description end AS address, OBD_SYS.GET_FIO(inv.mover) AS mover, OBD_SYS.GET_FIO(inv.accepts) AS acceptor from hrd.invent_process inv JOIN obd_sys.user_location loc ON (loc.user_id = inv.accepts) JOIN hrd.dict_room room ON (room.room_id = loc.room_id) JOIN hrd.building addr ON (addr.building_id = room.building_id) where inv.akt_id = :0
ds:DataSource.ds:Collection: select os.id_os id, os_type.name_type || ' ' || os_manufact.manufacturer_name || ' ' || os_model.name_model name, os.ser_number serial, os.invent_number inventory from hrd.invent_process inv join hrd.invent_os os on (os.id_os = inv.id_os) join hrd.invent_dict_type os_type on (os_type.id_type = os.type_os) join hrd.invent_dict_manufacturer os_manufact on (os_manufact.manufacturer_id = os.manafacture) join hrd.invent_dict_model os_model on (os_model.id_model = os.model_os) where inv.akt_id = :0
